faq.title: Find Answers About Our Services
faq.description: Excellence is part of our transparency. Learn more about how we drive you in style.
faq.a1: The price is calculated based on the distance or the time it will be reserved. The average pricing is included with the car description
faq.a2: For clients who have paid online, you will have an option to cancel your reservation. We will be notified about it and will later refund your pain amount
faq.a3: The taxes are not included in the given price. They will be added later during the payment
faq.q4: For how long can i reserve a car?
faq.a4: We allow clients to reserve cars up to months! You can contact us if you need additional information about a specific event.
faq.q5: What type of reservations can I book?
faq.a5: We can provide hourly reservations, as well as events and trips. it includes events such as wedding, funeral, school pickups and more.
